Member Function Documentation

void paper::CpaperClient::getInfo ( Cvar &  var) [virtual]

Fills var with information about the client.

  • clientId Id of client
  • rights.change Set to 1 when client has rights to change drawing.
  • rights.owner Set to 1 when client is owner.
  • rights.cursor Set to 1 when client may show a cursor.
  • rights.chat Set to 1 when client may chat.
  • rights.description Description of the key
void paper::CpaperClient::setInfo ( Cvar &  var)

Sets info fields of client (can be anything)
